name: Paralysis (itch) (hpnrep6)
description:
First person 3D horror game made for the Two Minute Horror Game Jam.

Tested to be working on Linux and Windows, and to be somewhat working on MacOS (still playable though).

The ideal display resolution for this is 1920 x 1080. Although other resolutions do work, the start menu UI might look a bit off.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Jump
Left Mouse - Toggle Flashlight
P - Restart game
Escape - Return to start screen

Game github: https://github.com/hpnrep6/TwoMinuteHorrorGame-Paralysis

Sound credits:
https://freesfx.co.uk/
https://www.freesoundeffects.com/
